title.value: Biomedical discovery through the integrative biomedical knowledge hub (iBKH)
title.justification: The title is explicitly given at the beginning of the paper and throughout the document.
title.quote:
Article

Biomedical discovery through the integrative biomedical knowledge hub (iBKH)

extractions.description: This paper introduces the integrative Biomedical Knowledge Hub (iBKH), a comprehensive biomedical knowledge graph, and demonstrates its application in biomedical knowledge retrieval and drug repurposing, particularly for Alzheimer's disease, using machine learning techniques.

type.justification: The paper discusses the development and application of iBKH, including experiments with drug repurposing, which characterizes it as empirical research.
type.quote: As a proof of concept, we performed our iBKH-based method for computational in-silico drug repurposing for Alzheimer’s disease.

name.justification: The paper focuses on the creation and utilization of a biomedical knowledge graph, which falls under the domain of biomedical knowledge management.
name.quote: we created a comprehensive BKG called the integrative Biomedical Knowledge Hub (iBKH) by harmonizing and integrating information from diverse biomedical resources.

name.justification: The paper extensively discusses drug repurposing using the iBKH.
name.quote: A case study: iBKH-based knowledge discovery for Alzheimer’s disease drug repurposing

name.justification: The paper mentions the implementation of a graph learning module within iBKH.
name.quote: To enable high-quality knowledge discovery, we further integrated modern graph learning pipelines in iBKH.

name.justification: TransE is explicitly mentioned as one of the KGE algorithms used in the study.
name.quote: We used four advanced KGE algorithms in DGL-KE including TransE.

is_contributed.justification: TransE is a well-known algorithm in the field and was used in the study, not introduced.
is_contributed.quote: We used four advanced KGE algorithms in DGL-KE including TransE.

is_executed.justification: The study executed TransE as part of its KGE framework.
is_executed.quote: We used four advanced KGE algorithms in DGL-KE including TransE.

is_compared.justification: TransE's results are compared with other KGE models in the study.
is_compared.quote: Table 4 shows that the four KGE models can achieve desirable performance in link prediction in iBKH.

referenced_paper_title.value: Translating embeddings for modeling multi-relational data
referenced_paper_title.justification: This is the seminal paper introducing the TransE algorithm.
referenced_paper_title.quote: Bordes et al. Translating embeddings for modeling multi-relational data.

name.justification: TransR is explicitly mentioned as one of the KGE algorithms used in the study.
name.quote: We used four advanced KGE algorithms in DGL-KE including TransR.

is_contributed.justification: TransR is a known model in the field and was utilized in the study, not introduced.
is_contributed.quote: We used four advanced KGE algorithms in DGL-KE including TransR.

is_executed.justification: The study executed TransR as part of its KGE framework.
is_executed.quote: We used four advanced KGE algorithms in DGL-KE including TransR.

is_compared.justification: TransR's results are compared with other KGE models in the study.
is_compared.quote: Table 4 shows that the four KGE models can achieve desirable performance in link prediction in iBKH.

referenced_paper_title.value: Learning Entity and Relation Embeddings for Knowledge Graph Completion
referenced_paper_title.justification: This is the paper known for introducing the TransR model.
referenced_paper_title.quote: Lin et al. Learning entity and relation embeddings for knowledge graph completion.

name.justification: ComplEx is explicitly mentioned as one of the KGE algorithms used in the study.
name.quote: We used four advanced KGE algorithms in DGL-KE including ComplEx.

is_contributed.justification: ComplEx is a pre-existing model that was used in the study.
is_contributed.quote: We used four advanced KGE algorithms in DGL-KE including ComplEx.

is_executed.justification: The study executed ComplEx as part of its KGE framework.
is_executed.quote: We used four advanced KGE algorithms in DGL-KE including ComplEx.

is_compared.justification: ComplEx's results are compared with other KGE models in the study.
is_compared.quote: Table 4 shows that the four KGE models can achieve desirable performance in link prediction in iBKH.

referenced_paper_title.value: Complex Embeddings for Simple Link Prediction
referenced_paper_title.justification: This is the primary paper introducing ComplEx.
referenced_paper_title.quote: Théo et al. Complex Embeddings for Simple Link Prediction.

name.justification: DistMult is explicitly mentioned as one of the KGE algorithms used in the study.
name.quote: We used four advanced KGE algorithms in DGL-KE including DistMult.

is_contributed.justification: DistMult is a well-known KGE model and was used in the study, not a new contribution.
is_contributed.quote: We used four advanced KGE algorithms in DGL-KE including DistMult.

is_executed.justification: The study executed DistMult as part of its KGE framework.
is_executed.quote: We used four advanced KGE algorithms in DGL-KE including DistMult.

is_compared.justification: DistMult's results are compared with other KGE models in the study.
is_compared.quote: Table 4 shows that the four KGE models can achieve desirable performance in link prediction in iBKH.

referenced_paper_title.value: Embedding Entities and Relations for Learning and Inference in Knowledge Bases
referenced_paper_title.justification: This is the foundational paper for DistMult.
referenced_paper_title.quote: Yang et al. Embedding entities and relations for learning and inference in knowledge bases.

name.justification: DrugBank is mentioned multiple times as a source of drug-related data used in the construction of iBKH.
name.quote: DrugBank, a web-enabled database containing comprehensive molecular information about drugs.

referenced_paper_title.value: DrugBank 5.0: a major update to the DrugBank database for 2018
referenced_paper_title.justification: This is the latest update referenced for the DrugBank dataset which is used in the study.
referenced_paper_title.quote: Wishart et al. DrugBank 5.0: a major update to the DrugBank database for 2018.

name.justification: CTD is mentioned as one of the diverse biomedical knowledge sources integrated into the iBKH.
name.quote: Comparative Toxicogenomics Database (CTD): A knowledge base that relates toxicological information for chemicals, genes, phenotypes, and diseases.

referenced_paper_title.justification: This reference provides the latest update on CTD which is utilized in this research.
referenced_paper_title.quote: Davis et al. The comparative Toxicogenomics database: update 2019.

name.justification: Reactome is identified as a source for pathway data in the iBKH.
name.quote: Reactome - A knowledge base of molecular details of signal transduction, transport, DNA replication, metabolism, and other cellular processes.

referenced_paper_title.justification: This paper provides detailed information on the Reactome database used in the study.
referenced_paper_title.quote: Fabregat et al. The reactome pathway knowledgebase.

name.justification: ChEMBL is mentioned as a source for molecular entity data in the iBKH.
name.quote: ChEMBL, a manually curated database of bioactive drug-like properties.

referenced_paper_title.value: ChEMBL: a large-scale bioactivity database for drug discovery
referenced_paper_title.justification: This is a key reference describing ChEMBL, utilized in this research for molecular data.
referenced_paper_title.quote: Gaulton et al. ChEMBL: a large-scale bioactivity database for drug discovery.

name.justification: DGL-KE is explicitly mentioned as the library used for implementing graph learning in iBKH.
name.quote: we have implemented a knowledge discovery module based on DGL-KE (Deep Graph Library – Knowledge Embedding).

referenced_paper_title.value: DGL-KE: training knowledge graph embeddings at scale
referenced_paper_title.justification: This paper provides the foundational implementation details of DGL-KE used in this study.
referenced_paper_title.quote: Zheng et al. DGL-KE: training knowledge graph embeddings at scale.
